channel.title: Bryan Singer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Terence Stamp, Brooding Legend of British Cinema, Dies at 87
item.description: The actor earned an Oscar nom for his first film, ‘Billy Budd,’ was menacing in ‘Superman,’ ‘The Limey’ and ‘The Collector’ and romanced Julie Christie on and off the screen.

item.title: X-Men at 25 is more relevant than ever
item.description: “Mankind has always feared what it doesn’t understand.” Plus: our seven favorite scenes
